sense.def:
To sway
pomeni nagibati se ali nihati v eno in drugo stran.

seg.quote: She sang and swayed from side to side.

sense.def:
To be swayed by something that one hears or reads
pomeni, da na človeka vpliva nekaj, kar sliši ali prebere.

seg.quote: Do not be swayed by glamorous advertisements.

sense.def:
To be under the sway of someone or something
pomeni biti pod vplivom nekoga ali nečesa;

seg.quote: Laing was coming increasingly under the sway of new ideas.
The beliefs which now hold sway may one day be rejected.
